stories.title: Survey HN: Have you switched your company interviews from verbal to leetcode?

stories.text:
With a friend from the university, we realized that many developers are pasting sensitive data on random websites in order to decode some Base64, JWT, compress some images...etc without wondering what the website does with this data. Therefore, we developed a free, open source and completely offline Windows app designed to help with these little common tasks. While we released multiple updates these past months, we finally reached v1.0 today.

https://devtoys.app

Feedback appreciated :-) Thanks!
stories.title: Show HN: DevToys.app – A Swiss Army knife for developers
